articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: 150 people arrested in US-Europe darknet drug probe - New York Post
articles.description: Law enforcement officials in the U.S. and Europe have arrested 150 people and seized more than $31 million in an international drug trafficking investigation.
articles.content: WASHINGTON Law enforcement officials in the U.S. and Europe have arrested 150 people and seized more than $31 million in an international drug trafficking investigation stemming from sales on the dar… [+2689 chars]
